name: DODGER (illdie)
description:
DODGE the BULLETS

SHRINK the CUBES

ROLL to VICTORY

Earn coins to unlock upgrades and new characters.

Download includes wav of the background music.

That is all :)

(EXCEPT also try out the HTML spin-off, DODGER: Swirl!)

CONTROLS (KEYBOARD):
WASD/ARROW KEYS - MOVE
Z/J - ROLL
X/K - BACK

CONTROLS (GAMEPAD):
LEFT STICK/D-PAD - MOVE
FACE1 - ROLL
FACE2 - BACK
